name: searxng
description: Search the web using SearXNG, a privacy-focused metasearch that aggregates results from multiple search engines (Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, Brave, Wikipedia, etc.). Returns unified titles, snippets, URLs, and source engines.
documentation: SearXNG is a privacy-focused metasearch engine that aggregates results from multiple search engines into a single unified response. Use for general web searches, research, and current information. Unlike single-engine searches, SearXNG provides diverse results from multiple sources. Common triggers: asking about current events, recent updates, technical documentation, research topics, finding resources across multiple sources. Pair with web_read for full article content when snippets are insufficient.

trigger.description: Initiated by Chalie during reasoning when external information is needed

categories.description: Comma-separated categories (general, social media, images, news, etc.)

time_range.description: Time range: day, week, month, year

tips: Use for current information not in memory
SearXNG aggregates from multiple engines for diverse results
Pair with web_read to get full article content from promising results
Use memorize to persist key findings as gists or facts
